pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extracting Insights from Biological Images // Combines the 'magick' and 'imager' packages to streamline image analysis, focusing on feature extraction and quantification from biological images, especially microparticles. By providing high throughput pipelines and clustering capabilities, 'biopixR' facilitates efficient insight generation for researchers (Schneider J. et al. (2019) doi:10.21037/jlpm.2019.04.05).
